name: Aiden's Awesome Air Hockey
description:
Welcome to the best air hockey all around town, now available at Aiden's Awesome Arcade!

To restart, press R. To take a break, feel free to turn the table off.

This is a small project I created in order to introduce myself to the Godot engine and game development in general. There are likely many bugs, and I probably won't ever get around to fixing them in the near-future, but feel free to play around with the project regardless.
